CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( OR(ISPICKVAL (Industry_Group__c, "Technology"), ISPICKVAL (Industry_Group__c, "Consumer Brands"), ISPICKVAL (Industry_Group__c, "Finance and Insurance"), ISPICKVAL (Industry_Group__c, "Healthcare"), ISPICKVAL (Industry_Group__c, "Industrials")),
OR(ISPICKVAL(Company_Size_New__c, "Mid-Market"), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size_New__c, "MM - Small"), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size_New__c, "MM - Large"), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size_New__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size_New__c, "Strategic"), ISPICKVAL(Company_Size_New__c, "Micro")) ),
TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Auto ICP
